radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: A follow-up chest X-ray showed a normal result.

radiographic_examinations.findings: Multifocal patchy pulmonary opacities and a cyst, 1 cm in diameter, in the left apex.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: Follow-up CT performed 21 months after admission revealed an increase in subpleural reticular opacities and the development of multiple subpleural cystic spaces, suggestive of early honeycombing.

radiographic_examinations.findings: Patchy, bilateral, multifocal, subpleural reticular and ground-glass opacities, more in the lower lobes than in the upper lobes.
